div#desktop-nav{display:none}div#nav{display:none}div#page div#wrapper #header.row{display:none}body.orderProcess div#page div#wrapper #header.row{display:block}body.orderProcess div[role=navigation]#menu-container{margin-top:0 !important;margin-bottom:0 !important}@media only screen and (min-width:1025px){#content &gt; ul.features{background-color:#fff;max-height:40px;margin:0;padding:0;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap}#content &gt; ul.features li{margin:0;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;font-size:13px;width:25%}#content &gt; ul.features li a{display:block;color:#161b7a;padding:0;line-height:40px;font-weight:normal;text-align:center}#content &gt; ul.features li a img{display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;margin-right:5px}}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){#content{padding-top:0 !important}#content &gt; ul.features{display:none}#menu-container{position:-webkit-sticky;position:sticky;top:0;z-index:101}}/*# sourceMappingURL=gbNavigation.css.map */
